import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
import sqlite3
source.1a81c81e:
# Connect to the file (.db)
Sql = sqlite3.connect('../input/clubhouse-dataset/Clubhouse_Dataset_v1.db')
# Read the file as Data frame
df = pd.read_sql_query("SELECT * FROM user", Sql)
source.497a7630: f'The Data has {df.shape[0]} Rows and {df.shape[1]} Columns'
source.a4161109:
num = df.drop_duplicates(subset='name').nlargest(
      10, 'num_followers').iloc[:, [1, -4]].reset_index(drop=True)
print(f'The most peploe that has followers:')
num
source.6d3483f2:
num = df.drop_duplicates(subset='name').nlargest(
      10, 'num_following').iloc[:, [1, -3]].reset_index(drop=True)
print(f'The most peploe that follow others:')
num
source.34de1881:
plt.figure(figsize=(10,8))
plt.scatter(df['num_followers'], y= [i for i in range(len(df['num_followers']))], color='skyblue')
plt.title('Number of Followrs', size=20)
plt.ylabel('index in the Data Frame', size=15)
plt.xlabel('Number of Followers', size=15)
plt.show()
